question: Job application needs improvement. Please discuss your view about the point.
text: My name is Tien Dat Nguyen, and I’m an undergraduate student at KAIST majoring in Computer Science. Recently, I did a job search and discovered that Moloco is opening some Machine Learning internship positions in Seoul. I was thrilled by this opportunity because Machine Learning is my domain of interest and I have always been impressed by Moloco’s fantastic technological solutions.

In the preceding semesters, I took five courses that covered various machine learning topics such as Computer vision and Reinforcement learning. By participating in these courses’ projects, I acquired numerous valuable skills, including data processing, fine-tuning models, visualization, and many others. I contributed significantly to my teams, and I am confident that these experiences make me a strong candidate for your company’s opening positions.
For more details about my experiences and skills, please have a look at the resume attached to this email.
Again, thank you for spending time considering my job application. I look forward to hearing back from you.
